content: --मातृक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [न देवो मेघो माता वृष्टिकारकः यस्य] not rained upon; (<ab>lit.</ab>) not having the god of rain as mother to suckle or water; hence (artificially) supplied with the water of rivers, canals &c., irrigated; वितन्वति क्षेममदेवमातृकाश्चिराय तस्मिन्कुरवश्चकासते <ls>Ki. 1. 17.</ls>
